00200     which may have been modified by the user in ebuser.c

00704       printf("             -w show wheel -D to start as a daemon\n\n");
00705       return 0;
00706     }
00707   }
00708 
00709   printf("Program mevb/EBuilder version 3 started\n\n");
00710   if (daemon)
00711   {
00712     printf("Becoming a daemon...\n");

00714   }
00715 
00716   /* Connect to experiment */

00718   if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00719     return 1;
00720

00722   status = cm_exist("Ebuilder", FALSE);
00723   if (status == CM_SUCCESS)
00724   {
00725     cm_msg(MERROR,"Ebuilder","Ebuilder running already!.\n");
00726     cm_disconnect_experiment();
00727     return 1;
00728   }
00729 
00730   /* Connect to ODB */
00731   cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKey);
00732 
00733   /* Setup tree */

00735     db_create_record(hDB, 0, "EBuilder", strcomb(ebuilder_str));
00736   db_find_key(hDB, 0, "EBuilder", &hEKey);
00737 
00738   /* EB setting handle */
00739   db_find_key(hDB, hEKey, "Settings", &hSetKey);
00740   size = sizeof(EBUILDER_SETTINGS);
00741   status = db_get_record(hDB, hSetKey, &ebset, &size, 0); 
00742 
00743   /* Get hostname for status page */
00744   gethostname(ebset.hostname, sizeof(ebset.hostname));
00745   size =  sizeof(ebset.hostname);
00746   db_set_value(hDB, hSetKey, "hostname", ebset.hostname, size, 1, TID_STRING);
00747 
00748   /* Get EB statistics */
00749   db_find_key(hDB, hEKey, "Statistics", &hStatKey);
00750 
00751   /* extract format */
00752   if (equal_ustring(ebset.format, "YBOS"))
00753     fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00754   else if (equal_ustring(ebset.format, "MIDAS"))
00755     fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00756   else /* default format is MIDAS */
00757   {
00758     cm_msg(MERROR,"EBuilder", "Format not permitted");
00759     goto error;
00760   }
00761 
00762   /* Check for run condition */
00763   size = sizeof(state);
00764   db_get_value(hDB,0,"/Runinfo/state", &state, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00765   if (state != STATE_STOPPED)
00766   {
00767     cm_msg(MTALK,"EBuilder","Run must be stopped before starting EBuilder");
00768     goto error;
00769   }
00770 
00771   /* Scan EB Channels */
00772   if (db_find_key(hDB, hEKey, "Channels", &hChKey) != DB_SUCCESS)
00773   {
00774     db_create_record(hDB, hEKey, "Channels", strcomb(ebuilder_channel_str));
00775     db_find_key(hDB, hEKey, "Channels", &hChKey);
00776   }
00777 
00778   for (i=0, j=0, nfragment=0; i<MAX_CHANNELS ; i++)
00779   {
00780     db_enum_key(hDB, hChKey, i, &hSubkey);
00781     if (!hSubkey)
00782       break;
00783     db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00784     if (key.type == TID_KEY)
00785     {
00786       /* read channel record */
00787       sprintf(ebch[j].name, "%s", key.name);
00788       status = db_find_key(hDB, hSubkey, "Statistics", &(ebch[j].hStat));
00789       status = db_find_key(hDB, hSubkey, "Settings", &hKey);
00790       size = sizeof(EBUILDER_SETTINGS_CH);
00791       status = db_get_record(hDB, hKey, &(ebch[j].set), &size, 0);
00792       j++;
00793       nfragment++;
00794     }
00795   }
00796 
00797   /* Register transition for reset counters */
00798   if (cm_register_transition(TR_START, tr_prestart, 300) != CM_SUCCESS)
00799     goto error;
00800   if (cm_register_transition(TR_STOP, tr_stop, 700) != CM_SUCCESS)
00801     goto error;
00802 
00803   if (debug)
00804     cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
00805 
00806   /* Destination buffer */
00807   status = bm_open_buffer(ebset.buffer, EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE, &hBuf);
00808   if(debug)printf("bm_open_buffer dest returns %d\n",status);
00809   if (status != BM_SUCCESS && status != BM_CREATED) {
00810     printf("Error return from bm_open_buffer\n");
00811     goto error;
00812   }
00813 
00814   /* set the buffer write cache size */
00815   status = bm_set_cache_size(hBuf, 0, 200000);
00816   if(debug)printf("bm_set_cache_size dest returns %d\n",status);
00817 
00818   /* allocate destination event buffer */
00819   dest_event = (char *) malloc(nfragment*(max_event_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER)));
00820   memset(dest_event, 0, nfragment*(max_event_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER)));
00821   if (dest_event == NULL) {
00822     cm_msg(MERROR,"EBuilder","Not enough memory for event buffer\n");
00823     goto error;
00824   }
00825 
00826   /* Set fragment_add function based on the format */
00827   if (fmt == FORMAT_MIDAS)
00828     meb_fragment_add = eb_mfragment_add;
00829   else if (fmt == FORMAT_YBOS)
00830     meb_fragment_add = eb_yfragment_add;
00831   else {
00832     cm_msg(MERROR,"mevb","Unknown data format :%d", fmt);
00833     goto error;
00834   }
00835 
00836   /* Main event loop */
00837   do {
00838     if (run_state != STATE_RUNNING) {
00839       /* skip the source scan and yield */
00840       status = cm_yield(500);
00841       if (wheel) {
00842         printf("...%c Snoring on %1.0lf\r", bars[i_bar++ % 4], ebstat.events_sent);
00843         fflush(stdout);
00844       }
00845       continue;
00846     }
00847 
00848     /* scan source buffer and send event to destination
00849     The source_scan() serves one event at the time.
00850     The status returns:
00851     EB_SUCCESS, BM_ASYNC_RETURN, EB_ERROR
00852     In the case of no fragment found(timeout), a watchdog would
00853     kick in for a fix amount of time. If timeout occur,
00854     the run state is checked and memory channels are freed
00855     */
00856     status = source_scan(fmt, nfragment, hBuf, dest_event);
00857     switch (status) {
00858     case BM_ASYNC_RETURN:
00859     // No event found for now:
00860     // Check for timeout 
00861       for (fragn=0; fragn<nfragment ;fragn++) {
00862         if (ebch[fragn].timeout > TIMEOUT) {  /* Timeout */
00863           if (stop_requested) { /* Stop */
00864             if (debug) printf ("Stop requested on timeout %d\n", status);
00865 
00866             /* Flush local destination cache */
00867             bm_flush_cache(hBuf, SYNC);
00868 
00869             /* Call user function */
00870             eb_end_of_run(gbl_run, strout);
00871 
00872             /* Cleanup buffers */
00873             handFlush(nfragment);
00874 
00875             /* Detach all source from midas */
00876             source_unbooking(nfragment);
00877 
00878             /* Compose message */
00879             stop_time = ss_millitime() - request_stop_time;
00880             sprintf(strout,"Run %d Stop on frag#%d; events_sent %1.0lf DT:%d[ms]",
00881               gbl_run, fragn, ebstat.events_sent, stop_time);
00882 
00883             /* Send message */
00884             cm_msg(MINFO,"EBuilder","%s",strout);
00885 
00886             run_state = STATE_STOPPED;
00887             abort_requested = FALSE;
00888             break;
00889           }
00890           else { /* No stop requested */
00891             ebch[fragn].timeout = 0;
00892             status = cm_yield(100);
00893             if (wheel) {
00894               printf("...%c Timoing on %1.0lf\r", bars[i_bar++ % 4], ebstat.events_sent);
00895               fflush(stdout);
00896             }
00897           }
00898         }
00899         //else { /* No timeout */
00900         //  status = cm_yield(50);
00901         //}
00902       }   /* do loop */
00903       break;
00904     case EB_ERROR :
00905     case EB_USER_ERROR :
00906       abort_requested = TRUE;
00907       if (status == EB_USER_ERROR)
00908         cm_msg(MTALK,"EBuilder","Error signaled by user code - stopping run...");
00909       else
00910         cm_msg(MTALK,"EBuilder","Event mismatch - Stopping run...");
00911       cdemask = 0;
00912       if (cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, 0) != CM_SUCCESS) {
00913         cm_msg(MERROR, "EBuilder", "Stop Transition request failed");
00914         goto error;
00915       }
00916       break;
00917     case EB_SUCCESS :
00918     case EB_SKIP :
00919       //   Normal path if event has been assembled
00920       //   No yield in this case.
00921       break;
00922     default:
00923       cm_msg(MERROR, "Source_scan", "unexpected return %d", status);
00924       status = SS_ABORT;
00925     }
00926 
00927     /* EB job done, update statistics if its time */
00928 
00929     /* Check if it's time to do statistics job */
00930     if ((actual_millitime = ss_millitime()) - last_time > 1000) {
00931       /* Force event to appear at the destination if Ebuilder is remote */
00932       rpc_flush_event();
00933       /* Force event ot appear at the destination if Ebuilder is local */
00934       bm_flush_cache(hBuf, ASYNC);
00935 
00936       /* update all source statistics */
00937       for (j=0 ; j<nfragment ; j++) {
00938 
00939         /* Compute statistics */
00940         if ((actual_millitime > start_time) && ebch[j].stat.events_sent) {
00941           ebch[j].stat.events_per_sec_ = ebch[j].stat.events_sent
00942             / ((actual_millitime-last_time)/1000.0);
00943 
00944           /* Update ODB channel statistics */
00945           db_set_record(hDB, ebch[j].hStat
00946             , &(ebch[j].stat)
00947             , sizeof(EBUILDER_STATISTICS), 0);
00948         }
00949       }
00950 
00951       /* Compute destination statistics */
00952       if ((actual_millitime > start_time) && ebstat.events_sent) {
00953         ebstat.events_per_sec_ = gbl_events_sent
00954           / ((actual_millitime-last_time)/1000.0) ;
00955 
00956         ebstat.kbytes_per_sec_ = gbl_bytes_sent
00957           /1024.0/((actual_millitime-last_time)/1000.0);
00958 
00959         /* update destination statistics */
00960         db_set_record(hDB, hStatKey
00961           , &ebstat
00962           , sizeof(EBUILDER_STATISTICS), 0);
00963       }
00964 
00965       /* Keep track of last ODB update */
00966       last_time = ss_millitime();
00967 
00968       /* Reset local rate counters */
00969       gbl_events_sent = 0;
00970       gbl_bytes_sent = 0;
00971 
00972       /* Yield for system messages */
00973       status = cm_yield(50);
00974       if (wheel && (run_state != STATE_RUNNING)) {
00975         printf("...%c Idleing on %1.0lf\r", bars[i_bar++ % 4], ebstat.events_sent);
00976         fflush(stdout);
00977       }
00978     }
00979   } while (status != RPC_SHUTDOWN && status != SS_ABORT);
00980   if (status == SS_ABORT)
00981     goto error;
00982   else
00983     goto exit;
00984 
00985 error: 
00986   cm_msg(MTALK,"EBuilder","Event builder error. Check messages"); 
00987 
00988 exit:
00989   /* Detach all source from midas */
00990   printf("EBuilder-Unbooking\n");
00991   source_unbooking(nfragment);
00992 
00993   /* Free local memory */
00994   free_event_buffer(nfragment);
00995 
00996   /* Clean disconnect from midas */
00997   cm_disconnect_experiment();
00998   return 0;
00999 }
